dependencies.description: Brotli is a generic-purpose lossless compression algorithm
dependencies.name: brotli

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Guile is the GNU Ubiquitous Intelligent Language for Extensions, the
official extension language for the GNU operating system.
dependencies.name: guile

dependencies.description:
Libidn2 is a free software implementation of IDNA2008, Punycode and
TR46. Its purpose is to encode and decode internationalized domain
names.
dependencies.name: libidn2

dependencies.description:
The Nettle package contains the low-level cryptographic library that is
designed to fit easily in many contexts.
dependencies.name: nettle

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description: An IRC to other chat networks gateway.
dependent_to.name: bitlbee

dependent_to.description: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
dependent_to.name: blast-plus

dependent_to.description:
CUPS is the standards-based, open source printing system developed by
Apple Inc. for macOS and other UNIX-like operating systems. CUPS uses
the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) to support printing to local and
network printers. This provides the core CUPS libraries, not a complete
CUPS install.
dependent_to.name: cups

dependent_to.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax
dependent_to.name: curl

dependent_to.description: The Emacs programmable text editor.
dependent_to.name: emacs

dependent_to.description: Network-related giomodules for glib.
dependent_to.name: glib-networking

dependent_to.description: High performance HTTP server stress & benchmark utility.
dependent_to.name: httpress

dependent_to.description:
GNU libmicrohttpd is a small C library that is supposed to make it easy
to run an HTTP server as part of another application.
dependent_to.name: libmicrohttpd

dependent_to.description:
Librelp is an easy to use library for the RELP protocol. RELP (stands
for Reliable Event Logging Protocol) is a general-purpose, extensible
logging protocol.
dependent_to.name: librelp

dependent_to.description: libzip is a C library for reading, creating, and modifying zip archives.
dependent_to.name: libzip

dependent_to.description: Free, lightweight, scalable C++ library for finite element methods.
dependent_to.name: mfem

dependent_to.description:
OpenLDAP Software is an open source implementation of the Lightweight
Directory Access Protocol. The suite includes: slapd - stand-alone LDAP
daemon (server) libraries implementing the LDAP protocol, and utilities,
tools, and sample clients.
dependent_to.name: openldap

dependent_to.description: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.
dependent_to.name: qemu

dependent_to.description:
QPDF is a command-line tool and C++ library that performs content-
preserving transformations on PDF files.
dependent_to.name: qpdf

dependent_to.description: rtmpdump is a toolkit for RTMP streams.
dependent_to.name: rtmpdump

dependent_to.description: Feature-rich console based todo list manager
dependent_to.name: task

dependent_to.description: TaskWarrior task synchronization daemon
dependent_to.name: taskd

dependent_to.description:
WeeChat is a fast, light and extensible chat client, with a text-based
user interface.
dependent_to.name: weechat

dependent_to.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.
dependent_to.name: wget

dependent_to.description: Graphical network analyzer and capture tool
dependent_to.name: wireshark

description:
GnuTLS is a secure communications library implementing the SSL, TLS and
DTLS protocols and technologies around them. It provides a simple C
language application programming interface (API) to access the secure
communications protocols as well as APIs to parse and write X.509, PKCS
#12, OpenPGP and other required structures. It is aimed to be portable
and efficient with focus on security and interoperability.
name: gnutls

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
